name: Alien Pop!
description:
The Aliens are invading Earth & you, the Red hatted boy will save it!

Shoot the Aliens down with your trusty gun at all cost for if they reach the ground you are on it will be destroyed!

Touch the Alien or fall through the platform and its game over!

Luckily you can collect slime points from you kills, and use them to acquire power ups to lengthen your chance of survival, as in speed up, magnet, triple shot and many more!

Try it for free and let me know of what other power ups you would like to be added, or just your opinion on how I can improve the game.

I will add the top 3 powers to the next version.

If I get a hundred downloads, and at least 25$ in profit I will do an update with your thoughts in mind.
